name: Reaper Run (Akromakroma)
description:
The souls of the condemned are running wild along Underworld Route 666 and it's up to the Grim Reaper's apprentice (Smol) Mori to stop them! Collect coins, pick up powerups, and beat down the baddies!

[This is a Hololive fan game. I am not associated with Cover Corp or Hololive. This project was made while following all guidelines under the Hololive Derivative Works guidelines (https://en.hololive.tv/terms). There is no monetization in this game.]

Support Mori Calliope!

Music provided by Fesliyan Studios for non-commercial use.
